description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take jogging to the next level with "Extreme Jogging". Compete across 10 action-packed stages on the global highscore board to become the greatest jogger in the world.
description.short: Take jogging to the next level with "Extreme Jogging". Compete across 10 action-packed stages on the global highscore board to become the greatest jogger in the world.
